title: How does
subtitle: Get personalized financial coaching through AI-powered conversation. Your intelligent finance coach is ready to help you make smarter money decisions.

step1.title: Write your expense
step1.description: Simply send a message: "Spent $50 at supermarket" and Bilio will automatically record your expense.

step2.title: Automatic categorization
step2.description: Bilio identifies your expense category automatically and suggests how to optimize your budget.

step3.title: Receive insights
step3.description: Get detailed reports, budget alerts and personalized advice to improve your financial health.
